name: Dobberman
body: #__Dobber__man app for windows phone ##Introduction **Dobber**man is an app that aims to bridge this gap and help users report their problems to the companies as they happen, in real time. Full documentation can be found online at the [app's website](http://www.wix.com/olgazeli/doberman). ##Technology teh app uses Windows Azure to host a wcf service as well as SQL Azure and Azure Blobs. The client is a WP7.1 written in C# and Silverlight.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
